Detailed Description

template<typename P, typename PS = P>
class geometry::strategy::within::winding< P, PS >

Within detection using winding rule.

Template parameters:
  • P point type of point to examine
  • PS point type of segments, defaults to P
Concepts for P and PS:
  • specialized point_traits class
Author:
The implementation is inspired by terralib http://www.terralib.org (LGPL) and http://geometryalgorithms.com/Archive/algorithm_0103/algorithm_0103.htm
Note:
Added the horizontal case, for "completely within"

Is tested for points ON border, more tests have to be done.

More efficient (less comparisons and no divison) than the cross count algorithm
